Member Function Documentation

bool RODOS::LinkinterfaceUDP::getNetworkMsg ( NetworkMessage &  inMsg,
int32_t &  numberOfReceivedBytes 
) [virtual]

Processs all received Data. When a NetworkMessage is complete it returns true

Parameters:
inMsgNetworkMessage to write to. When return false this may contain incomplete Data, so do not touch it
numberOfReceivedBytesWhen return=true this contains the number of Bytes really received or -1 if it is unknown. Should be ==Networkmessage.numberOfBytesToSend() in case of no error.

Reimplemented from RODOS::Linkinterface.

void RODOS::LinkinterfaceUDP::init ( ) [virtual]

Link interface to the gateway, look up a free UDP input port and assign a corresponding node number used as ID in the network.

Reimplemented from RODOS::Linkinterface.

virtual void RODOS::LinkinterfaceUDP::putFromInterrupt ( const long  topicId,
const void *  any,
int  len = 0 
) [virtual]

do not locks any semaphore. Do not call any thread funcion default function resumes the associated thread (if defiend) if it is waiting for it

Reimplemented from RODOS::Subscriber.

bool RODOS::LinkinterfaceUDP::sendNetworkMsg ( NetworkMessage &  outMsg) [virtual]

Retrieve a message in network potocol format from an associated UDP port.

Parameters:
outMsgpointer to message to send wrapped in network structure
Returns:
true - if sending was successful, false - otherwise

Reimplemented from RODOS::Linkinterface.
